1b1('bum): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin sna
1b2('bum): ga nga / 
1b3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha dA ti'i dus khrim
2a1('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dngapa' sngon gyi mthar mi
2a2('bum): dmigs so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
2a3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i kham sa dben pa'i phyir
2a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid
2b1('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub
2b2('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
2b3('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang 'phyi ma'i mthar
2b4('bum): mi dmig so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// sa'i khams me
2b5('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'
3a1('bum): / dbus su mi dmigs so// sa'i khams dben pa 'byor byang chub sems dpa' dbus
3a2('bum): su mi dmigs so// sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmigs so// 
3a3('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang lda danu pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sau'i khams med dpa dang / sa'i khams stong
3a4('bum): pa nyid dang / sa'i khams ben pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
3a5('bum): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus su mi dmigs te/ sa'i khams mid pa yang
3a6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sa'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma
3b1('bum): yin/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha'
3b2('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
3b3('bum): de ltar na/ sa'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams dben pa gang
3b4('bum): yin pa dang / sa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub/ sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / 
3b5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis
3b6('bum): su med de gnyisu byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
3b7('bum): dmigaso// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// chu'i khams dben pa'i
4a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// tshu'i kham snang ba nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
4a2('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs// chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir
4a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// tshul kham
4a4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems pa pa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// chu'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
4a5('bum): mi dmigs// chu'i khams stong pa ni/  kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs/ tshul kham pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sa
4a6('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'adabus su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
4a7('bum): datI'i bu tshul khams med pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid dang / chu'i khams dben pa dang / tshu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi
4a8('bum): dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ chu'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhanam
4b1('bum): yim chu'i khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin// chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
4b2('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chu'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
4b3('bum): chu'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
4b4('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyisu dbyar med do// tshe dang ldan dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ dme'i khams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
4b5('bum): gyi mtha' mi dmigs so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyi ra byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ me'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha
4b6('bum): mi dmigs so// me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// 
4b7('bum): me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams
4b8('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// me'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// me'i khams stong pa nyid kyi
5a1('bum): phying byang chub sems dpa'adabus su mi dmigs pa// mal khams dben pa'i phying byang chub sems dpa' dbus su me migs pa// mo la 'ams bca/ 
5a2('bum): meng pa'i phying byang chub sems bus su mi dmigs sa// de tso phyi zhen/ mdang ldan pa shA ra ti'i bu mo la khams med pa dang / ma'i khams stong panyid dang / mo
5a3('bum): dben pa dang / me'i khams ngong meng pa la sgron gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs dbus mi dmigs te/ me'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 
5a4('bum): mo'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma'i dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mo'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ya
5a5('bum): gzhan ma yin sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mthara' yang gzhan ma yin dbus kyi/ nga gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bur
5a6('bum): ltar na me'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / ma'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / me'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang me'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang
5a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang sngon gyi mthar gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byung
5a8('bum): meng // tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs sa// rlung gi khams snang pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
5b1('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
5b2('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
5b3('bum): mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
5b4('bum): dmigs so// rlung gi khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
5b5('bum): dmigs so// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
5b6('bum): mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams med pa dang rlung gi khams stong pa nyid dang / rlung gi khams dben pa dang rlung gi
5b7('bum): khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' ma dmigs dbus mi dmigs te/ rlung gi khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin// rlung gi khams stong / 
5b8('bum): pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin rlung gi khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ 
6a1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu de ltar na
6a2('bum): rlung gi khams med pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 
6a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa dethams cad kyang gnyis su med gnyis byar med do// 
6a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// namakha'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
6a5('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// rnam pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// namakha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
6a6('bum): sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam kha'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang 'phyi ma mthar mi dmigs so// nam ma po'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa 'phyi ma'i mthar mi
6a7('bum): dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// nam mkha' khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
6a8('bum): dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// nam mapa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 
6b1('bum): nam pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe
6b2('bum): na tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu na mkha'i khams med pa dang / na mkha'i khams stong pa nyid dang / na mkha'i khams dben pa dang / na mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi
6b3('bum): dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs / dbus mi dmigs te/ na mkha'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ na mkha'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// na mkha'i
6b4('bum): khams dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ na mkha'i khams ngo ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
6b5('bum): gzhan ma yin phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na namakha'i khams med pa gang yin par
6b6('bum): namamapa'i khams stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang namakha'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / namakha'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / 
6b7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes
6b8('bum): pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par
7a1('bum): shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
7a2('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
7a3('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med
7a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa'i phyir byang chub se/ rnams dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa'i
7a5('bum): khams stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi nga mi/ gas so// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// rnam par
7a6('bum): shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa dang / rnam par
7a7('bum): shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ 
7a8('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa
7b1('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ 
7b2('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams sto/ 
7b3('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang // sngon gyi
7b4('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de ga nyi su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ma
7b5('bum): rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmi gso// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems/ dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir/ 
7b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// ma rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
7b7('bum): mthar mi dmig so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// ma rig pa ngo
7b8('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// ma rig pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems
8a1('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
8a2('bum): dbus su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa med pa dang / ma rig pa stong pa nyid dang / ma rig pa dben pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa la
8a3('bum): sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigaso// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ ma rig pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// ma rig
8a4('bum): pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma rig pa ngo bo nyid me dra pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// / 
8a5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang ga/ zhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ma rig pa med pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa stong
8a6('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang // ma rig pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
8a7('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyisu byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
8a8('bum): gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 
8b1('bum): 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir
8b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
8b3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 'du byed med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'du byed stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa'adabus su mi dmig so// 'du byed
8b4('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
8b5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed med pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid dang / 'du byed dben pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs
8b6('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ 'du byed med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma
8b7('bum): yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na
8b8('bum): 'du byed med pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byed dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'du byed ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / 
9a1('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyis byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
9a2('bum): bu rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par
9a3('bum): shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// rnam par shes
9a4('bum): pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ming dmig so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// rnam par shes
9a5('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi da mig so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang / chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// rnam par she
9a6('bum): pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
9a7('bum): sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par
9a8('bum): shes pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi
9b1('bum): dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rnam par shes pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rnam par shes pa dben pa yang gzhan ma
9b2('bum): yin/ rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan
9b3('bum): ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rnam par shes pa med pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang
9b4('bum): rnam par shes pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang
9b5('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de// gnyi su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dadwa ti'i bu ming
9b6('bum): dadang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ming
9b7('bum): dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 
9b8('bum): ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar mi dmigs so// 
10a1('bum): ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
10a2('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
10a3('bum): mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// / 
10a4('bum): deci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ming dang gzug dngas med pa dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid dang / ming dang gzugs dben pa dang / ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid
10a5('bum): med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' rmi dmigs dbus mi dmigs te/ ming dngag/ thugs med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ming dang gzugs
10a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ ming dang gzugs dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin
10a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi mi'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na ming dang gzugs med pa gang yin pa
10a8('bum): dang / ming dang gzugs stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs dben pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
10b1('bum): dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis byar medo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu skye
10b2('bum): mched drug med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// skye mched drug dben
10b3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// skye mched drug med pa'i phyir byang chub
10b4('bum): sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
10b5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// skye mched drug med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
10b6('bum): dbus mi dmigaso// skye mched drug stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigaso// skye mched drug ngo bo
10b7('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu skye mched drug med pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid dang // skye mched drug dben
10b8('bum): pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ skye mched drug med pa yang gzhan ma yin// skye mched drug stong pa/ 
11a1('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
11a2('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na skye mched drug med pa gang
11a3('bum): yin pa dang / skye mched drug stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang skye mched drug dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
11a4('bum): dang sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yi/ dran pa dang // dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis med gnyisu byar medo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa
11a5('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon/ gyi mthar mi dmigaso// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
11a6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// reg pa ngo bo nyid mod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
11a7('bum): dmig so// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i
11a8('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// reg pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// reg pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi
11b1('bum): dmig so// reg pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
11b2('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa med pa dang / reg pa stong pa nyid dang / reg pa dben pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus
11b3('bum): mi dmigs te/ reg pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// 
11b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' rang yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
11b5('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na reg pa med pa gang yin pa dang // reg pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / reg pa dben pa gang yi/ na pa dang / reg pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang
11b6('bum): chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu med gnyis byar medo// tshe dang ldan pa
11b7('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang
11b8('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
12a1('bum): mi dmigaso// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig
12a2('bum): so tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// tshor ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// tshor ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
12a3('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmigaso// 
12a4('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshor ba med/ pa dang / tshor ba stong pa nyid dang / tshor ba dben pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs
12a5('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ tshor ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshor ba stong pa nyi kyang gzhan ma yin// tshor ba dben pa yang gzhan ma
12a6('bum): yin/ tshor ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus
12a7('bum): kyang gzhan ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na tshor ba med pa gang yin pa dang / tsher ba stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba ngo bo nyid med
12a8('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su me de gnyi su
12b1('bum): byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// 
12b2('bum): sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs// sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
12b3('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// sred pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar mi dmigaso// sred pa
12b4('bum): 'obo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi nga dmig so// sred pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dang / 'a dbus su mi dmig so// sred pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
12b5('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// sred pa dang / na pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
12b6('bum): mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sred pa med pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid dang / sred pa dben pa dang / sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi
12b7('bum): dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sred pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ sred pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 
12b8('bum): sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// dbus
13a1('bum): kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sred pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sred pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sred pa dben pa
13a2('bum): gang yin pa dang / sred pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
13a3('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu len pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// len pa
13a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i
13a5('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// len pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha/ ra mi dmigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang
13a6('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
13a7('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// len pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// len pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 
13a8('bum): len pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// len pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
13b1('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu len pa med pa dang len pa stong pa nyid dang / len pa dben pa dang len pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs// phyi mi'i mtha' mi dmigs
13b2('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ len pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ len pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ len pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ len pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yi
13b3('bum): bya chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ 
13b4('bum): len pa med pa gang yin pa dang / len pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / len pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / len pa ngo bo nyid med pa ga dang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / 
13b5('bum): sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med gnyi su byar mdo// tshe dang ldan pa shA dwa ti'i bu srid pa med pa'i phyir byang/ 
13b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
13b7('bum): dmigaso// srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// srid pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// srid pa stong pa
13b8('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems
14a1('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// srid pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigaso// srid pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub chub sems dang 'dabus/ 
14a2('bum): su mi dmigaso// srid pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
14a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu srid pa med pa dang / srid pa stong pa nyid dang / srid pa dben pa dang / srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs
14a4('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ srid pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// srid pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang
14a5('bum): gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'am za' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yi no// tshe dang
14a6('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na srid pa gang yin pa dang / srod pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / srid pa dben pa gang yin pa dang // srid pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems
14a7('bum): dpe' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med gnyis byar medo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
14a8('bum): skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon/ 
14b1('bum): gyi mthar mi dmig so// skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ming mthar mi dmig so// skye ba stong / 
14b2('bum): nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// skye ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
14b3('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// skye ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// skye ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs// skye ba dben pa'i phyir/ 
14b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// skye ba de bo ni dang med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ming mi dgas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
14b5('bum): skye ba med pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid dang / skye ba dben pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' ming migs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs
14b6('bum): te skye ba med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ skye ba stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// skye ba dben pa yang gzhan ma yin// skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin// 
14b7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba stong pa nyid
14b8('bum): gang yin pa dang / skye ba dben pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin la byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
15a1('bum): dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu meng gnyisu byar med// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs// 
15a2('bum): rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang sems
15a3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// rga shi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyir ma'i mthar mi dmig so// rga shi dben
15a4('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i ma thur mi dmig so// rga shi med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
15a5('bum): dbus mi dmig so// rga shi stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub se/ mas dpa' dbus mi dmig so// rga shi dben pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// rga shi ngo bo nyid
15a6('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rga shi med pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid dang / rga shi dben pa dang / rga shi ngo bo
15a7('bum): nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ rga shi med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi
15a8('bum): dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha'
15b1('bum): yang gzhan ma yin// dbus kyang gzhan ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na rga shi med pa gang yin pa dang / rga shi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rga shi dben pa gang yin/ 
15b2('bum): pa dang / rga shi ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thad kyang
15b3('bum): gnyisu me de gnyisu byar medado// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi
15b4('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// sbyin dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des
15b5('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
15b6('bum): phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// sprin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid
15b7('bum): med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
15b8('bum): sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dpon pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
16a1('bum): dbus mi dmigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
16a2('bum): phyin pa dben pa dang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan
16a3('bum): ma yin sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
16a4('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzha na ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha
16a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi/ na pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin/ pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid
16a6('bum): med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu med gnyisu byar
16a7('bum): memodo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub
16a8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i
16b1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
16b2('bum): phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// chu khrim
16b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// tshul
16b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nu ba dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmigaso// / 
16b5('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang/ chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe/ na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
16b6('bum): phyin pa med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'
16b7('bum): mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs dbus mi dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan
16b8('bum): ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma
17a1('bum): yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na tshul
17a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims
17a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thad
17a4('bum): kyang gnyisu med gnyis byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// bzod pa'i pha
17a5('bum): da kyi sa mang smra// snang 'i ba shu ma
17a6('bum): dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
17a7('bum): dmig so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
17a8('bum): dmig so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
17b1('bum): mi dmig so// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi
17b2('bum): dmigs// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigaso// de'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / bzod
17b3('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mthar mi
17b4('bum): dmigs// dbus mi dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol
17b5('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol/ tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chu ba sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang
17b6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / 
17b7('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang
17b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyisu med de gnyis byar med do// 
18a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid
18a2('bum): kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
18a3('bum): tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// / 
18a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mo dmig so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sem
18a5('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
18a6('bum): phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
18a7('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmigaso// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir
18a8('bum): zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / brtson
18b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs// dbus mi dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma/ 
18b2('bum): yinang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid
18b3('bum): med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin// sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// / 
18b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus da kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / brtson
18b5('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa/ dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha'
18b6('bum): gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de tha~Md kyang gnyi su med gnyis byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub
18b7('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub
18b8('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i
19a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi mthar ming mig so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// bsam gtan gyi
19a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// / 
19a3('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 
19a4('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dadapa' dbus su mi dmigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbas
19a5('bum): su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / bsam gtan
19a6('bum): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha
19a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi
19a8('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang
19b1('bum): gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dadwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngasam gtan gyi pha rom/ 
19b2('bum): phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i ma
19b3('bum): gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi
19b4('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa'i dad kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig ngas so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang
19b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol
19b6('bum): tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// shes rab kyi pha rol
19b7('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// shes rab kyi pha
19b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dbus su mi dmig so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// shes rab kyi pha rol
20a1('bum): ga rkyen pa dzin pa'i phying byang chub sems pa'adangs mi dmigs// shes pa 'i pha rol phyin par banyid med pa'i phyi byang chub sems dpa'adabus su mi dmigs/ phy-i'i phyi
20a2('bum): zhen tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
20a3('bum): pa ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmig so// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmig so// dbus mi dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa
20a4('bum): nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo/ ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang / 
20a5('bum): gzhan ma yin sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i/ mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yi no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol
20a6('bum): tu phyin pa med pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa gang
20a7('bum): yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// / 
20a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// / bam po don bdun pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// nang stong pa/ 
20b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byung / 
20b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
20b3('bum): mthar mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// / 
20b4('bum): nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi mi dag so// nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dang/ 'a dbus su mi dmigaso// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byung
20b5('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
20b6('bum): bu nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs / phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi
20b7('bum): dmigs ste/ nang stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan
20b8('bum): ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar
21a1('bum): na nang stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 
21a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang de/ dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa
21a3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid
21a4('bum): dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir
21a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong / pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang
21a6('bum): chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar mi dmig so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// phyi stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
21a7('bum): dmigasaso// phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med
21a8('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi
21b1('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs ste/ phyi stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ 
21b2('bum): ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i
21b3('bum): mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na phyi stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi stong
21b4('bum): pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin dab dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
21b5('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis med ga/ nyisu byar medo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs/ 
21b6('bum): phyinang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i
21b7('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ma mi
21b8('bum): so/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// phyi nang stong pa nyid med pani
22a1('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
22a2('bum): dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / phyi
22a3('bum): nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbu mi dmig te/ phyi nang stong pa nyid med pa yang
22a4('bum): gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ daphyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi nang ste// nga pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems
22a5('bum): dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na phyi nang stong pa
22a6('bum): nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin/ 
22a7('bum): ba dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa
22a8('bum): nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang
22b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems/ 
22b2('bum): dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
22b3('bum): mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi
22b4('bum): dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir bya ngabyang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
22b5('bum): dbus su mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid/ med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmi gas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
22b6('bum): bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs// phyi
22b7('bum): mi'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben
22b8('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang
23a1('bum): gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang / 
23a2('bum): yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / 
23a3('bum): phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon
23a4('bum): gyi mthar mi dmig so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir bya/ chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
23a5('bum): mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byangachub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' mi dmig so// chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
23a6('bum): mthar mi dmigaso// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// chen po
23a7('bum): stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
23a8('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
23b1('bum): dbus su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid med pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dben pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid
23b2('bum): med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ chen po stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ca gzhan ma yin/  chen
23b3('bum): postong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha
23b4('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yino// tshe dang ldan dpa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na chen po stong pa nyid med pa gang yi ngan pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 
23b5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi mi'i
23b6('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyis byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar
23b7('bum): mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// 
23b8('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar ma dmigs so// don dam pa
24a1('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// rdo/ 
24a2('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// don de pa stong pa nyid stong pa
24a3('bum): nyi kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang
24a4('bum): / chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra da ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa dadang don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyidang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ben pa dang / 
24a5('bum): stong pa nyid ngo ba nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigasaphyi ma'i mtha' ma dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ don ngas pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa
24a6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin// 
24a7('bum): sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / don dam/ 
24a8('bum): pastong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi/ 
24b1('bum): mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyis su byur me // tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus dus stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byung
24b2('bum): chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems
24b3('bum): dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
24b4('bum): phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 'dus bya stong pa nyid stong pa nyi da kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 'dus bya stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
24b5('bum): mthar mi dmig so// 'dus bya stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mo'i mthar mi dmig so// 'dus bya stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus
24b6('bum): mi dmig so// 'dus bya stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// 'dus bya stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbusu mi dmig so// 'dus bya stong pa nyid do// 
24b7('bum): bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa dbusu mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus bya stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus bya stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus bya ste/ 
24b8('bum): pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus bya stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi mi'i mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'dus bya stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus bya stong pa
25a1('bum): / nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus bya stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus bya stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/ 
25a2('bum): ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'dus bya stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus
25a3('bum): byastong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus bya stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus bya stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang / 
25a4('bum): yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyi su byar medo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma bya stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub
25a5('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// 'dus ma bya stong pa nyi nga stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// 'dus ma bya stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub
25a6('bum): sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// 'dus ma bya stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// 'dus ma bya stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi/ 
25a7('bum): ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 'dus ma bya stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// 'dus ma bya stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs
25a8('bum): so/ 'dus ma bya stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 'dus ma bya stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus ma bya stong pa
25b1('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med/ 
25b2('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'dus
25b3('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med
25b4('bum): pa yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa/ yang gzhan ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa
25b5('bum): yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yi na/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan mi yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yi no// tshe dang ldan
25b6('bum): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma bya steng
25b7('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mthar gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med
25b8('bum): gnyis byar me // tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir
26a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das/ 
26a2('bum): pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// 
26a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi
26a4('bum): dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med nga ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang
26a5('bum): chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems/ dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// mtha' las 'das pa stong
26a6('bum): pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
26a7('bum): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa
26a8('bum): stong pa nyid nge ba nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin// mtha' las 'das
26b1('bum): bstong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub
26b2('bum): sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na mtha' las
26b3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong/ 
26b4('bum): pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dang da' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / da phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams// 
26b5('bum): cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyi su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// thog
26b6('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// 
26b7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chu sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// thog ma dang tha ma meng pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig
26b8('bum): so/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar
27a1('bum): mi dmig so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i
27a2('bum): phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ben
27a3('bum): pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
27a4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / nga thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma
27a5('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmi/ gas/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang
27a6('bum): gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo
27a7('bum): nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// 
27a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
27b1('bum): nyid dben pa gang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang
27b2('bum): yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyi su med de gnyis su byar med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi
27b3('bum): dmig so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigaso// 
27b4('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub se dmas dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmig so// dor ba med pa ste dang pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi mi'i mthar mi
27b5('bum): dmig so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang / chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmig so// dor ba mi/ da pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i
27b6('bum): mthar mi dmig so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigaso// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su
27b7('bum): mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmig so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigaso// 
27b8('bum): dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa dang / dor ba med
28a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs// phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmig
28a2('bum): dbus mi dmigs te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa yang gzhan ma
28a3('bum): yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin/ phyi mi'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin// 
28a4('bum): dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang //
