255a2('bum): zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / 
255a3('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
255a4('bum): sdig ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dngos pa med pa'i de nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongs mi rtog/ dngos po meng pa'i ngo
255a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma yong ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yong su mi rtog/ dngos po med pango bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med
255a6('bum): ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben
255a7('bum): zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams 'de zhes bya ba dang // sdug bsngal
255a8('bum): zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces
255b1('bum): bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma
255b2('bum): med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / 
255b3('bum): ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dran nye bar bzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces
255b4('bum): bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog/ yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag ces bya ba dang // 
255b5('bum): bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ yang dag par spong / rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar ro// ngasu mi rtog/ yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya ba dang // 
255b6('bum): mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa
255b7('bum): yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
255b8('bum): dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bde zhes
256a1('bum): bya ba dang // sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yong su mi rtog/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yong su mi rtog/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang
256a2('bum): pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yong su mi rtog/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
256a3('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rdzu 'phrul
256a4('bum): gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yod dasu mi rtog go// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ 
256a5('bum): dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba yongasu mi rtog/ dbang po rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dbang po rnams 'ad/ 
256a6('bum): ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dbang po rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yong su mi rtog/ dbang po rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar
256a7('bum): yongasu mi rtog/ dbang po rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dbang po rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi
256a8('bum): rtogo// dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ dbang po rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ stabs rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / 
256b1('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar yong su ma rtag/ stongs rnams 'de zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ stobs rnams dag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs mi rtog/ 
256b2('bum): stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongs mi rtog/ stobs rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba/ 
256b3('bum): dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smin pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ stobs rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar
256b4('bum): yongasu mi rtog/ stobs rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / ming dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ byang chub kyi yan gang lag rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu
256b5('bum): mi rtog/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bde zhes bya ba dngasdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya
256b6('bum): bar yongasu mi rtog/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtogo/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar
256b7('bum): yongasu mi rtog/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa
256b8('bum): med ces bya bar yong su mi rtog/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya
257a1('bum): bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
257a2('bum): bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i/ 
257a3('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog
257a4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa yod ces bya
257a5('bum): ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma ni nAM sa bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
257a6('bum): brgyad pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams pa/ 
257a7('bum): zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug ces bya
257a8('bum): ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / 
257b1('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / 
257b2('bum): ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yong
257b3('bum): su mi rtog/ bsam gtan rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ bsam gtan rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ bsam gtan
257b4('bum): rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rto// dgo// bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhe/ das bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// bsam gtan rnams mtshan
257b5('bum): ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog bsam gtan rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ bsam gtan rnam
257b6('bum): zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ tshad med pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya
257b7('bum): bar yong su mi rtog/ tshad med pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ tshad med pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 
257b8('bum): tshad med pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ tshad med pa rnams mtshan ma
258a1('bum): yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ tshad med pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 
258a2('bum): tshad me pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ tshad med pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
258a3('bum): pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ gzugs
258a4('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ gzugs med pa'i/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces
258a5('bum): bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'ju/ pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
258a6('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi
258a7('bum): rtog/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben
258a8('bum): zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog rnam par thar pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
258b1('bum): yongasu mi rtog/ rnam par thar pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam par thar pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 
258b2('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog
258b3('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam par thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam par
258b4('bum): thar pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bangar yongasu mi rtog/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar
258b5('bum): yongasu mi rtog/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'a/ jug pa rnams bde zhes bya ba ba dang / sdug bsngal zhe sa bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par
258b6('bum): 'jug pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog// / 
258b7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba
258b8('bum): dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ mthar gyis gan
259a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang
259a2('bum): mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog
259a3('bum): rnam par thang pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
259a4('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan med pa dang gasmon pa
259a5('bum): med pa sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu migo/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong
259a6('bum): zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 
259a7('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
259a8('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
259b1('bum): pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams
259b2('bum): 'de zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ mngon par
259b3('bum): shes pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yong su mi rtog go/ mngon par shes
259b4('bum): pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnamangs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yod
259b5('bum): su mi rtog go/ mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtogo/ mngon par shes pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar
259b6('bum): yongasu mi rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi
259b7('bum): rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ 
259b8('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// ting nge 'dzin rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// ting 'dzin
260a1('bum): rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu
260a2('bum): mi rtog go/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yong su mi rtog/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 
260a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ngag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog// gzung
260a4('bum): kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ 
260a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar longasu mi rtog go/ gan+d+ha/ ngas kyi sgo rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa
260a6('bum): med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya
260a7('bum): bar yongasu mi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bde zhes bya ba
260a8('bum): dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
260b1('bum): stobs rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yong su mi rtog go/ 
260b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams smon pa yod ces bya
260b3('bum): dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
260b4('bum): stobs rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya/ bar yongasu mi rtog go/ mi 'jigs pa rnams rta/ dag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 
260b5('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ mi 'jig pa rnam sa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongs
260b6('bum): mi rtog go/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// mi 'jigs pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 
260b7('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ mi 'jigs pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med pa ces bya bar// 
260b8('bum): yongasu mi rtog go// mi 'jigs pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yong su mi rtog go// mi 'jigs pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar
261a1('bum): yongasu mi rtog go// so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// so so yang dag par
261a2('bum): rig pa rnams bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi
261a3('bum): rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes
261a4('bum): bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ so so yang dag par
261a5('bum): rig pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa/ med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes
261a6('bum): bya bar yongasasu mi rtog go/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasasu mi rtog go// byams pa chen po rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag
261a7('bum): ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ byams pa chen po bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ byams pa chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag
261a8('bum): med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// byams pa chen po sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// byams pa chen po stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya
261b1('bum): bar yongasu mi rtog go/ byams pa chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ byams pa chen po smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon
261b2('bum): pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ byams pa chen po ni zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ byams pa chen po dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya
261b3('bum): bar yongasu mi rtog go// snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ snying rje chen po bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 
261b4('bum): snying rje chen po bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag ces bya b.rayongasu mi rtog go/ snying rje chen po sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ snying
261b5('bum): rje chen po stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ snying rje chen po mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog
261b6('bum): snying rje chen po smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ snying rje chen po zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ snying rje chen po
261b7('bum): dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ sangs
261b8('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'di zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// sangs rgyas kyi chom 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med
262a1('bum): ces bya bar yongs mi rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba dang mi sdug ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// sangs rgyas/ 
262a2('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med
262a3('bum): ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
262a4('bum): 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dresad pa rnams dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar
262a5('bum): yongasu mi rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
262a6('bum): zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang
262a7('bum): mi sdug ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod
262a8('bum): ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ thams cad shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// thams
262b1('bum): cad shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// thams cad shes pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ 
262b2('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongasu mi
262b3('bum): rtog go// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yong su mi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug ces bya bar
262b4('bum): yongasu mi rtog go/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid stong zhe des bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go//  lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / 
262b5('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ lam gyi
262b6('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yong su mi rtog go/ 
262b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs
262b8('bum): su mi rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba dang / mi sdug
263a1('bum): ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
263a2('bum): mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar yongasu mi rtog
263a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar yongasu mi rtog/ 'di
263a4('bum): lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang / da' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ spyod pa'i tshe/ chos 'di dag la yongasu rtog pa med pa'i
263a5('bum): tshul gyis de ltar yongasu rtog go/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// / bam po dgu bcu pa
263a6('bum): smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir de skad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni tshor ba ma yin
263a7('bum): 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'du byed ma yin rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
263a8('bum): rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skadadu/ mig gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig ma yin/ rna ba'i ma skyes gang yin pa de ni// 
263b1('bum): nab ma yin/ sna'iri ma skyes pa gang yin bde na sna ma yin/ lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de na/ lde ma yin/ lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pade ni/ lus
263b2('bum): ma yin/ yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
263b3('bum): gzugs yin/ sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sgra ma yin/ dri'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dri ma yin/ ro' ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ro ma yin// 
263b4('bum): reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni reg ma yin// chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni chos mayin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na
263b5('bum): de skad du mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin ba de ni/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni// 
263b6('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa
263b7('bum): de ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma
263b8('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zeratshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin
264a1('bum): bde ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin 'di ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ 
264a2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin// 
264a3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg
264a4('bum): pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi
264a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gangayin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
264a6('bum): ba ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
264a7('bum): tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi
264a8('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin zhes/ 
264b1('bum): zere tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du ra'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
264b2('bum): chu'i khams ma yin/ me'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ me'i khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin
264b3('bum): nam mkha'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams
264b4('bum): ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir/ na de skad dum rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin/ ba de ni/ ma rig pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi ma
264b5('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin/ ming dang gzugs kyi ma skyes
264b6('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/ ming dang gzugs ma yin// skye mched drug gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drug ma yin/ reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
264b7('bum): reg pa ma yinapa/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma yin/ len pa'i ma skyes pa gang
264b8('bum): yin pa de ni len pa ma yin/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa ma yin/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de niskye ba ma yin// rga shi'i/ 
265a1('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi ma yin zhes zer tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma
265a2('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ 
265a3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ brtson 'grus
265a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam dgatan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ shes rab kyi pha
265a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan kha rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skadadu/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma
265a6('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
265a7('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni chen po stong pa
265a8('bum): nyid ma yin// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas
265b1('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni// 
265b2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa
265b3('bum): nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa
265b4('bum): nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong / pa nyid ma yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skye das pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma
265b5('bum): yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med
265b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni// 
265b7('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar
265b8('bum): bzhag pa rnams ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa
266a1('bum): de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa
266a2('bum): gang yin pa de ni// stobs rnams ma yin byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
266a3('bum): brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i
266a4('bum): bden pa rnams ma yin/ bsam gtan rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
266a5('bum): tshad med pa rnams ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyom sa par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ 
266a6('bum): rnam par thar pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
266a7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par
266a8('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ 
266b1('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin/ 
266b2('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
266b3('bum): mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes
266b4('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams

266b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyi smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
266b8('bum): gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba med/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs nges na/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin
267a1('bum): pade na gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha rad+ya t+yA'i dra/ tshor ban tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong par na tshor bam yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang
267a2('bum): ldan pa sha radwa ti'i tha rnam grangs nges na/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa tsher ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha rad ti'i bu 'du shes ni 'du shes kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa den/ 
267a3('bum): 'du shes ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i Ta/ rnam grangs nges na/ 'du shes kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du shes ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa
267a4('bum): rang ti'i bu'adu byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du byed ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan nga sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs de na/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes
267a5('bum): pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa radwa ti'i bu rnam par she ba ni rnam par shes pas steng ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba med/ 
267a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ran ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin bden/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dA ti'i bu mig ni mig gas
267a7('bum): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mig ma yinate/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mig gi sa skyes pa gang yin pa de/ mig ma yin// tshe dang / 
267a8('bum): ldan pa sha rad ti'i thun pa ni rnabs stong ste/ gang stong pade ni rnab ma yin te/ skyeb med do// che nga ldan pa sha tu'i rdzarnam grangs nges na/ rna pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa/ 
267b1('bum): rna ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna ni snas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa ti'i thun ma grangs nges na// sna ma
267b2('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de sna ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce ni lces stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lce ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs
267b3('bum): des na/ lce'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus ni lus kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa / 
267b4('bum): radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs de na/ lus kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra ti'i bu yid ni yid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid ma
267b5('bum): yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ma grangs des na yid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin ba de ni yid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
267b6('bum): gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin
267b7('bum): bde gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sgra ni smras stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sgra ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 
267b8('bum): sgra'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sgra ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dri ni dris stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dri ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des
268a1('bum): na/ dri'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dri ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i thur ni ros stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rom yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan
268a2('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ ro'o ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ro ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg ni reg gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni reg ma yin te skye ba med// 
268a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ reg gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de reg ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos ni chos kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chos
268a4('bum): ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnams grangs des na/ chos kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chos ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra tin
268a5('bum): bu mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas ste/ gang stong pa de ni mig gi rnam par shes pa na yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa ti'i bu rnamam/ 
268a6('bum): des na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong
268a7('bum): ste gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pade/ 
268a8('bum): rnam par shes pa ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti bu sna'i rnam par shes pa ni sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do// 
268b1('bum): 'arje pa ga sa mas la ma sa kyil ba de sna'i rnam par shes pa ma yi no// tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa bu lce'i rnam par shes pa ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang
268b2('bum): stong pa de ni lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba mengo // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ lce'i rnam par
268b3('bum): shes pa ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste gang stong pa de ni lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do// 
268b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha rang
268b5('bum): ti'i bu yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi rnam pa shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
268b6('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ 
268b7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i ma
268b8('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong / gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te/ 
269a1('bum): reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin bden/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin// 
269a2('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni sna'i te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te/ skye ba medado// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 
269a3('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa
269a4('bum): de ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang da ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lce'i 'dus te reg
269a5('bum): pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pas sto/ ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te
269a6('bum): skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 
269a7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 
269a8('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni// mig gis
269b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na
269b2('bum): mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rna ba'i 'dus te reg
269b3('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te/ skye ba med do// tshe dang
269b4('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rna ba'i 'dus te/ da reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa dade/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ma yino// tshe
269b5('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsherab ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas sto/ ste/ gang stong pa de ni sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
269b6('bum): tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
269b7('bum): gyis tshor ba ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lho'i 'dus te reg
269b8('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ lce'i 'dus
270a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor/ 
270a2('bum): bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
270a3('bum): gyis tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni
270a4('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ste/ ga stong pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor dab ma yin te skye ba med// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
270a5('bum): rnam grangs des na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen rgya sa tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin// tshe dang ldan
270a6('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sa'i khams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sa'i khams skye
270a7('bum): ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sa'i khams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chu'i khams chu'i khams kyi stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chu'i khams ma yin te skye ba medado// tshe dang
270a8('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chu'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de chu'i khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu me'i khams ni me'i khams kyis stong ste/ 
270b1('bum): gang stong pa de ni me'i khams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ me'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de me'i khams ma yin no// tshe dang
270b2('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rlung gi khams ni rlung gi khams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rlung gi khams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 
270b3('bum): rlung gi khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rlung gi khams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu na mkha'i khams ni na mkhrims kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni na mkha'i kham
270b4('bum): ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnams grangs des na/ na mkha'i khams kyi ma skye das pa gang yin pa de/ namakha'i khams ma yin no// 
270b5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ gang stepa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin te skye ba medado// 
270b6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa
270b7('bum): ti'i bu ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ma rig pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ ma rig pa'i ma skyes pa gang
270b8('bum): yin pa de/ ma rig pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'du byed ni 'du byed kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'du byed ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
271a1('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'du byed kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'du byed ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par shes pa ni
271a2('bum): rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang
271a3('bum): yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ming dang gzugs ni ming dang gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ming dang gzugs ma yin te skye ba med// 
271a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mingadang gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ming dang ga zugs ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye
271a5('bum): mched drug ni skye mched drug gis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni skye mched drug ma yin te skye ba med do// tshed nga ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ skye mched
271a6('bum): drug gi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de skye mched drug ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu reg pa ni reg pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni reg pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha
271a7('bum): radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ reg pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de reg pa ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tsher ba ni tsher bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshor ba ma yin te skye ba med// 
271a8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ tshor ba'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshor ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sred pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni srid pa ma yin/ 
271b1('bum): te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ sred pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sred pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu len pa ni len pas stong ste/ gang stong
271b2('bum): pa de ni len pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ len pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin 'de ni len pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
271b3('bum): srid pa ni srid pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni srid pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ srid pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de srid pa ma yin no// 
271b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu skye ba ni skye bas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni skye ba ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang lnga dan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ skye ba'i ma skyes pa
271b5('bum): gang yin pa de skye ba ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa ti'i bu rga shi ni rga shis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rga shi ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i/ 
271b6('bum): bu rnam grangs des na/ rga shi'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rga shi ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang steng
271b7('bum): ba de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sbyin pa'i pha rol
271b8('bum): tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
272a1('bum): pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshul
272a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
272a3('bum): ma yin te skye ba med// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na// bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yino// tshe dang ldan
272a4('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba me'o// / 
272a5('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ brtson 'a/ grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yino// tshe dang
272a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do// 
272a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha
272a8('bum): radwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha rangadwa
272b1('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang
272b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba medado// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nang
272b3('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba medado// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
272b4('bum): bu rnam grangs des na/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis
272b5('bum): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grang sa des ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa
272b6('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste// gang stong pa de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med
272b7('bum): dorje tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stong pa nyid ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chen po stong pa nyid ni chen
272b8('bum): po stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chen po stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang
273a1('bum): yin pa de chen po stong pa nyid ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu don dam pa stong pa nyid ni don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni/ 
273a2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de don dam pa stong pa nyid ma
273a3('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa
273a4('bum): sha ra dwa bu'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'dus byas stong pa de nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'dus byas stong pa nyi/  ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'dus ma
273a5('bum): byas stong pa nyid ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba medado// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 
273a6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
273a7('bum): kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi ma
273a8('bum): skyes pa gang yin de mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ 
273b1('bum): gang stong pa de ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang
273b2('bum): yin pa de thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dor ba med pa/ 
273b3('bum): stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skye ba gang yin pa de dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa
273b4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyidakyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyidad ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
273b5('bum): rnam grangs des na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa ga nga yin pa de rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thaMd/ 
273b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang
273b7('bum): yin pa de chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan
273b8('bum): nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma
274a1('bum): yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mi dmigs pa stong nyid ma
274a2('bum): yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan
274a3('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i
274a4('bum): bu rnam grangs nges na/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid
274a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa/ nyid ma yin te skye ba med// tshe dang ldan pa sha radwa ti/ 'i bu rnam grangs des na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma
274a6('bum): skyes pa gang yin pa de ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang
274a7('bum): stong pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin
274a8('bum): bde dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni
274b1('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dran
274b2('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang dag par spong ba rnams ni yang dag par spong ba rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni yang dag par spong // 
274b3('bum): ba rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des nas yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de yang dag par spong ba rnams ma yin// 
274b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang ste// nga pa de ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin te skye ba
274b5('bum): medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa
274b6('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu dbang po rnams ni dbang po rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dbang po rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ dbang
274b7('bum): po rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dbang po rnams ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu stobs rnams ni stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni stobs rnams ma yin te/ 
274b8('bum): skye ba mdo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de stobs rnams ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi yan
275a1('bum): lag rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha
275a2('bum): radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i lam
275a3('bum): yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas steng ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin te skye ba medado// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
275a4('bum): ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'phags pa'i lan yan ladag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha
275a5('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni 'phags pa/ 'i bden pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'pha gas pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med// tshe dang
275a6('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsam
275a7('bum): gtan rnams ni bsam gtan rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni bsam gtan rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na// bsam gtan
275a8('bum): rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de bsam gtan rnams ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu tshad med pa rnams ni tshad med pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni tshad med pa
275b1('bum): rnams ma yin te skye ba med// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ tshad med pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de tshad med pa rnams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha
275b2('bum): radwa ti'i bu gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
275b3('bum): rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de gzugs med pa'i
275b4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yino// tshe dang ldan// pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa rnams ni rnam par/ thar pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par
275b5('bum): thar pa rnams ma yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan pa radwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thar pa rna mas kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa rnam
275b6('bum): ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni
275b7('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
275b8('bum): rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med
276a1('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
276a2('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
276a3('bum): med pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mngon par shes pa rnams ni
276a4('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni de mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ mngon par
276a5('bum): shes pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting nge 'dzin rnams ni ting nge 'dzin rnams kyis stong ste/ 
276a6('bum): gang stong pa de ni ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin te skye ba med// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams
276a7('bum): ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan
276a8('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnams grangs des na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs
276b1('bum): pa'i stobs rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin te skye ba medado// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
276b2('bum): rnam grangs nges na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mi 'jigs
276b3('bum): pa rnams ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
276b4('bum): kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yi no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu so so yang dag par ni dag pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis
276b5('bum): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin te skye ba me // tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi ma skyes
276b6('bum): ba gang yin pa de// so so yang dag pa rig pa rnams ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byams pa chen po ni/ byams pa chen pos stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni byams pa chen po ma yin te/ 
276b7('bum): skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnams des na/ byams pa chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa des byams pa chen po ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu snying rje chen po ni/ snying rje chen
276b8('bum): pos stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni snying rje chen po ma yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ snying rje chen po'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ snying rje chen po ma yino// 
277a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha rad ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres parnams kyi stong ste/ ga / 
277a2('bum): stong pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin te skye ba medado// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de
277a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu thams cad shes pa nyid ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni thams cad shes pa nyid ma/ 
277a4('bum): yin te skye ba mdo// tshe dang ldan pa sha rang ti'i bu rnam grangs dnges na thams cad shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/  thams cad shes pa nyid ma yino// tshe dang ldan pa sha rang/ 
277a5('bum): ti'i bu lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam padzin sa pa nyid kyis stong ste ka gang stong pa de ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa
277a6('bum): rarAdwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam pa thang mkhyen pa nyid ni/ 
277a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba medo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na rnam pa thams cad
277a8('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yino// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ci'i phyir na de skad du/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa den
277b1('bum): gzugs ma yin tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du shes ma yin// 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma mi/ 
277b2('bum): rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ mig 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig ma yin/ rna ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba ma yin/ sna'i 'grib pa gang yin
277b3('bum): bde ni/ sna ma yin/ lce'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce ma yin/ lus kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni// lus ma yin/ yid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid ma yin gzugs kyi 'grib pa
277b4('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ sgra'i 'grib pa gang yin pa/ nga nisgra ma yin/ dri'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/  dri ma yin/ ro'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ ro ma yin// 
277b5('bum): reg gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg ma yin/ chos kyi 'gri kha pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos ma yin/ mig gi rnam pa/  shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi rnam par
277b6('bum): shes pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa
277b7('bum): ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ma
277b8('bum): yin yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig 'dus te reg pa ma yin// 
278a1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni
278a2('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin 'di ni lce'i 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni
278a3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ma yin/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
278a4('bum): tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa
278a5('bum): de ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yi// na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa/ gang yin pa de ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
278a6('bum): tshor ba ma yin/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
278a7('bum): gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gyis tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni// yid kyi 'dus te
278a8('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma yin/ sa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sa'i khams ma yin/ chu'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni// chu'i khams ma yin/ me'i khams
278b1('bum): kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni me'i khams ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rlung gi khams ma yin/ na mkha'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 
278b2('bum): nam mkha'i khams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin/ ma rig pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni// ma rig
278b3('bum): pa ma yin/ 'du byed kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'du byed ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ ming dang gzugs kyi 'grib pa
278b4('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ ming dang gzugs ma yin/ skye ma ched drug gi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye mched drugam yin/ reg pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ reg pa ma
278b5('bum): yin// tshor ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshor ba ma yi/ na sred pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sred pa ma yi// na/ len pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni// len pa ma yin// 
278b6('bum): srid pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ srid pa ma yin/ skye ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ skye ba ma yin/ rga shi'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rga shi ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
278b7('bum): tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
278b8('bum): yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni
279a1('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol phyin pa ma yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
279a2('bum): yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ nang stong pa nyid ma yin
279a3('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi stong pa nyid ma yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi
279a4('bum): 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ma yi dan chen po stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ chen po stong pa nyid ma yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib
279a5('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni// don dam pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
279a6('bum): kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ma yin// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ma yin// thog ma dang / 
279a7('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ dor ba med pa stong nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ 
279a8('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa pa gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma yin/ 
279b1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa
279b2('bum): nyid ma yin/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
279b3('bum): ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin/ dran pa nye bar gzha pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de
279b4('bum): ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin// yang dag pa/ ra spong ba rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ yang / dag par spong ba rnams ma yin// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam
279b5('bum): kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma yin/ dbang po rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ dbang po rnams ma yin/ stobs rnams kyi 'grib pa gang
279b6('bum): yin pa de ni/ stobs rnams ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ma yin// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
279b7('bum): pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma yin
279b8('bum): bsam gtan rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam gtan rnams ma yin/ tshad med pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ tshad med pa rnams ma yin// gzugs med pa'i
280a1('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ma yin// rnam par thar pa rnams kyi 'grib
280a2('bum): bgang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
280a3('bum): rnams ma yin/ rnam par mthar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
280a4('bum): pa dang smon pa med pa ma yin/ mngon par shes parnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mngon par shes pa rnams ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi 'grib pa gang
280a5('bum): yin pa de ni/ ting nge 'dzin rnams ma yin/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
280a6('bum): rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma yin// mi 'jigs pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ mi 'jigs pa rnams ma yin// so so yang
280a7('bum): dag par rig pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ma yin/ byams pa chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ byams pa chen po ma yin/ snying
280a8('bum): rje chen po'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni/ snying rje chen po ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa ba de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma
